title: SFSU Connect
description: A buy & sell website focused on San Francisco State University students and faculty. An excellent example of working in a team environment with a mock CEO, CTO, Milestones, and Deadlines.

title: Drone Prototyping Application
description: A website to be hosted on a raspberry pi for easy of access when prototyping with brushless motors and orientation sensors.

title: QuarantineMemo
description: Health Symptoms Tracking for COVID-19. Submission for 2020 Google Solutions Challenge.

title: Spades! Online Multiplayer Website
description: An online multiplayer experience for the card game Spades. Includes a game lobby and game rooms. Gameplay follows the official Spades rules.

title: P2P Decentralized Network
description: A lite version of Peer-to-peer software. Developed as a team remotely. End goal was to send a large file from peer to peer using BitTorrent protocol. Uses both UDP and TCP. Excellent example of using OOP to solve a complex issue with many moving parts.
